title: Evelynn Main Club
body: So I have not really seen any {{champion:28}} Eve main clubs so I decided to make on my own. The tag is Häte and it is really just a casual- club for eve mains to hang out in. If you want to be added add me @J4mesEvans

replies.body:
1. You do know these are the OCE boards and not the NA ones, right?
2. I'm the owner for one of the Evelynn clubs in OCE "Evlyn". 
3. You may want to post this on **/r/evelynnmains** and state your region. 

Hope this helps :)
